typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		{Org. commerciale} as string,
		{Canal distribution} as string,
		{Secteur d'activité} as string,
		{Document de vente} as string,
		Poste as string,
		{Jour calendaire} as string,
		{Agence commerciale corrigé} as string,
		{ATC Corrigé} as string,
		{Donneur d'ordre} as string,
		{Récept. de march.} as string,
		{Destinataire facture} as string,
		Article as string,
		{Type doc. vente} as string,
		{Type de poste} as string,
		Livraison as string,
		{Type de livraison} as string,
		{Type poste Livraison} as string,
		Facture as string,
		{Type de facture} as string,
		{Type poste Facture} as string,
		{Mois calendrier} as string,
		{Année civile} as string,
		{Motif commande} as string,
		{Qté cdée} as string,
		{CA cdé} as string,
		{Qté livrée} as string,
		{CA livré} as string,
		{Qté facturée} as string,
		{CA facturé} as string,
		{Cout standard cdé} as string,
		{Cout fabrication} as string,
		{Cout standard livré} as string,
		{Cout standard facturé} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> facturationbw
source(output(
		WholeSalerID as string,
		WholeSalerHubID as string,
		HubName as string,
		HubSAPid as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> PLATEFORMES
deleteOtherQuantityAndCA derive(date_id = replace({Jour calendaire},'-','')) ~> transfoDate
transfoDate derive(year = substring(date_id,1,4),
		yearmonth = substring(date_id,1,6),
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> extractYearMonth
extractYearMonth derive(year = substring(date_id,1,4),
		yearmonth = substring(date_id,1,6)) ~> extractYearMonthh
extractYearMonthh derive(fact_filter = iif ( ({Type de facture} =='YFAR' && ({Motif commande}=='FAS')  ||  ( {Type de facture}=='YFAB' && {Motif commande}=='FAS' )) ,1,0)) ~> FactFilterc
FactFilterc derive(qt_factur_e = {Qté facturée},
		ca_factur_ = {CA facturé},
		cout_standard_cd_ = {Cout standard cdé},
		cout_fabrication = {Cout fabrication},
		cout_standard_livr_ = {Cout standard livré},
		cout_standard_factur_ = {Cout standard facturé}) ~> AddColumn
AddColumn derive(year_month = substring(date_id,1,6)) ~> extractYearMonthc
extractYearMonthc filter(fact_filter==0 && !isNull(Article)) ~> FactFilter
PLATEFORMES filter(instr(WholeSalerID, 'DSC')> 0  ||instr(WholeSalerID, 'TEREVA')> 0) ~> filtreDSC
renameColumns, filtreDSC join({Récept. de march.} == HubSAPid,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> innerDSC
PLATEFORMES filter(instr(WholeSalerID, 'DSC')== 0  &&  instr(WholeSalerID, 'TEREVA')== 0) ~> filtreOtherPlateforme
renameColumns, filtreOtherPlateforme join({Récept. de march.} == HubSAPid,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> leftOuter
FactFilter select(mapColumn(
		{ Org. commerciale} = {Org. commerciale},
		{Canal distribution},
		{Secteur d'activité},
		{Document de vente},
		Poste,
		{Jour calendaire},
		{Agence commerciale corrigé},
		{ATC Corrigé},
		{Donneur d'ordre},
		{Récept. de march.},
		{Destinataire facture},
		{ vente} = {Type doc. vente},
		{Type de poste},
		Livraison,
		{Type de livraison},
		{Type poste Livraison},
		Facture,
		{Type de facture},
		{Type poste Facture},
		{Mois calendrier},
		{Année civile},
		{Motif commande},
		{Qté facturée},
		{CA facturé},
		{Cout standard cdé},
		{Cout fabrication},
		{Cout standard livré},
		{Cout standard facturé},
		date_id,
		year,
		yearmonth,
		fact_filter,
		qt_factur_e,
		ca_factur_,
		cout_standard_cd_,
		cout_fabrication,
		cout_standard_livr_,
		cout_standard_factur_,
		year_month,
		reference = Article
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> renameColumns
renameColumns, PLATEFORMES join({Récept. de march.} == HubSAPid,
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> leftPlateforme
leftPlateforme filter(isNull( HubSAPid )) ~> hubsapidNULL
innerDSC select(mapColumn(
		{Org commerciale} = { Org. commerciale},
		{Canal distribution},
		{Secteur d'activité},
		{Document de vente},
		Poste,
		{Jour calendaire},
		{Agence commerciale corrigé},
		{ATC Corrigé},
		{Donneur d'ordre},
		{recept de march} = {Récept. de march.},
		{Destinataire facture},
		{type doc vente} = { vente},
		{Type de poste},
		Livraison,
		{Type de livraison},
		{Type poste Livraison},
		Facture,
		{Type de facture},
		{Type poste Facture},
		{Mois calendrier},
		{Année civile},
		{Motif commande},
		{Qté facturée},
		{CA facturé},
		{Cout standard cdé},
		{Cout fabrication},
		{Cout standard livré},
		{Cout standard facturé},
		date_id,
		year,
		yearmonth,
		qt_factur_e,
		ca_factur_,
		year_month,
		reference,
		WholeSalerID,
		WholeSalerHubID,
		HubName,
		HubSAPid
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> dropColumns
leftOuter select(mapColumn(
		{ Org commerciale} = { Org. commerciale},
		{Canal distribution},
		{Secteur d'activité},
		{Document de vente},
		Poste,
		{Jour calendaire},
		{Agence commerciale corrigé},
		{ATC Corrigé},
		{Donneur d'ordre},
		{Recept de march} = {Récept. de march.},
		{Destinataire facture},
		{Type doc vente} = { vente},
		{Type de poste},
		Livraison,
		{Type de livraison},
		{Type poste Livraison},
		Facture,
		{Type de facture},
		{Type poste Facture},
		{Mois calendrier},
		{Année civile},
		{Motif commande},
		{Qté facturée},
		{CA facturé},
		{Cout standard cdé},
		{Cout fabrication},
		{Cout standard livré},
		{Cout standard facturé},
		date_id,
		year,
		yearmonth,
		qt_factur_e,
		ca_factur_,
		year_month,
		reference,
		WholeSalerID,
		WholeSalerHubID,
		HubName,
		HubSAPid
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> rename
rename derive(toreplicate = abs(toInteger({Qté facturée})),
		{CA facturé} = toDouble( {CA facturé}) / toDouble( {Qté facturée})) ~> typecaste
typecaste derive(toroll = mapLoop(abs(toInteger( {Qté facturée})), #index)) ~> toroll
toroll foldDown(unroll(toroll, toroll),
	mapColumn(
		{ Org commerciale},
		{Canal distribution},
		{Secteur d'activité},
		{Document de vente},
		Poste,
		{Jour calendaire},
		{Agence commerciale corrigé},
		{ATC Corrigé},
		{Donneur d'ordre},
		{Recept de march},
		{Destinataire facture},
		{Type doc vente},
		{Type de poste},
		Livraison,
		{Type de livraison},
		{Type poste Livraison},
		Facture,
		{Type de facture},
		{Type poste Facture},
		{Mois calendrier},
		{Année civile},
		{Motif commande},
		{Qté facturée},
		{CA facturé},
		{Cout standard cdé},
		{Cout fabrication},
		{Cout standard livré},
		{Cout standard facturé},
		date_id,
		year,
		yearmonth,
		qt_factur_e,
		ca_factur_,
		year_month,
		reference,
		WholeSalerID,
		WholeSalerHubID,
		HubName,
		HubSAPid,
		toreplicate,
		toroll
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> torolltoList
torolltoList window(over(yearmonth,
		HubSAPid,
		reference),
	asc(yearmonth, true),
	asc(HubSAPid, true),
	asc(reference, true),
	indexcols2 = rowNumber()) ~> Window1
Window1 derive(indexcols2 = yearmonth+HubSAPid+reference+toString(indexcols2),
		{Qté facturée} = iif(toDouble({Qté facturée})<=0, -1, 1)) ~> newColumns
newColumns derive({CA facturé} = {Qté facturée}*abs({CA facturé})) ~> CAfacture
typecaste filter(isNull({Qté facturée})) ~> quantityNULL
quantityNULL derive({CA facturé} = toDouble(ca_factur_),
		indexcols2 = yearmonth+HubSAPid+reference+"null",
		{Qté facturée} = toInteger({Qté facturée})) ~> qteNullFacturaction
CAfacture, qteNullFacturaction union(byName: true)~> UnionQteNullFacturation
facturationbw filter(!isNull({Qté cdée}) || !isNull({CA cdé})) ~> qteCAcde
facturationbw filter(!isNull({Qté livrée}) || !isNull({CA livré})) ~> qteCAlivre
facturationbw filter(!isNull({Qté facturée}) || !isNull({CA facturé})) ~> qteCAfacture
qteCAfacture select(mapColumn(
		{Org. commerciale},
		{Canal distribution},
		{Secteur d'activité},
		{Document de vente},
		Poste,
		{Jour calendaire},
		{Agence commerciale corrigé},
		{ATC Corrigé},
		{Donneur d'ordre},
		{Récept. de march.},
		{Destinataire facture},
		Article,
		{Type doc. vente},
		{Type de poste},
		Livraison,
		{Type de livraison},
		{Type poste Livraison},
		Facture,
		{Type de facture},
		{Type poste Facture},
		{Mois calendrier},
		{Année civile},
		{Motif commande},
		{Qté facturée},
		{CA facturé},
		{Cout standard cdé},
		{Cout fabrication},
		{Cout standard livré},
		{Cout standard facturé}
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> deleteOtherQuantityAndCA
qteCAlivre select(mapColumn(
		{Org. commerciale},
		{Canal distribution},
		{Secteur d'activité},
		{Document de vente},
		Poste,
		{Jour calendaire},
		{Agence commerciale corrigé},
		{ATC Corrigé},
		{Donneur d'ordre},
		{Récept. de march.},
		{Destinataire facture},
		Article,
		{Type doc. vente},
		{Type de poste},
		Livraison,
		{Type de livraison},
		{Type poste Livraison},
		Facture,
		{Type de facture},
		{Type poste Facture},
		{Mois calendrier},
		{Année civile},
		{Motif commande},
		{Qté cdée},
		{CA cdé},
		{Qté livrée},
		{CA livré},
		{Qté facturée},
		{CA facturé},
		{Cout standard cdé},
		{Cout fabrication},
		{Cout standard livré},
		{Cout standard facturé}
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select1
qteCAcde select(mapColumn(
		{Org. commerciale},
		{Canal distribution},
		{Secteur d'activité},
		{Document de vente},
		Poste,
		{Jour calendaire},
		{Agence commerciale corrigé},
		{ATC Corrigé},
		{Donneur d'ordre},
		{Récept. de march.},
		{Destinataire facture},
		Article,
		{Type doc. vente},
		{Type de poste},
		Livraison,
		{Type de livraison},
		{Type poste Livraison},
		Facture,
		{Type de facture},
		{Type poste Facture},
		{Mois calendrier},
		{Année civile},
		{Motif commande},
		{Qté cdée},
		{CA cdé},
		{Cout standard cdé},
		{Cout fabrication},
		{Cout standard livré},
		{Cout standard facturé}
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select2
dropColumns sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		yearmonth as string,
		year as string,
		month as string,
		qte_ecoulement as string,
		ca_ecoulement as string,
		POSSAMidString as string,
		HubSAPid as string,
		reference as string,
		distributeur as string,
		agence_code as string,
		marque as string,
		{Code postal} as string,
		marque_name as string,
		toreplicate as string,
		dd as string,
		rcount as string,
		indexcols2 as string,
		qte_ecc as string
	),
	partitionFileNames:['AZ_facturationDescTEREVA_update.csv'],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> facturationForDSCTEREVA
typecaste sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		{Région Statistique} as string,
		Enseigne as string,
		{Marque DESC} as string,
		{Marque Code} as string,
		{Sous Famille} as string,
		{Référence Article Fournisseur} as string,
		{Article National DESC} as string,
		{Article National Code} as string,
		{Agence Code} as string,
		{Agence DESC} as string,
		{Département DESC} as string,
		{Département ID} as string,
		Secteur as string,
		{Quantité en UV BL} as string,
		{Année Précédente (Quantité en UV BL)} as string,
		{Cumul Exercice (Quantité en UV BL)} as string,
		{Cumul Exercice A-1 (Quantité en UV BL)} as string,
		{MOIS CA PRR N} as string,
		{MOIS CA PRR N-1} as string,
		{CA PRR au cumul} as string,
		{CA PRR au cumul N-1} as string,
		fileName as string
	),
	partitionFileNames:['facturationForOther_update.csv'],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> facturationForOtherPlateform
filtreOtherPlateforme sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		{Région Statistique} as string,
		Enseigne as string,
		{Marque DESC} as string,
		{Marque Code} as string,
		{Sous Famille} as string,
		{Référence Article Fournisseur} as string,
		{Article National DESC} as string,
		{Article National Code} as string,
		{Agence Code} as string,
		{Agence DESC} as string,
		{Département DESC} as string,
		{Département ID} as string,
		Secteur as string,
		{Quantité en UV BL} as string,
		{Année Précédente (Quantité en UV BL)} as string,
		{Cumul Exercice (Quantité en UV BL)} as string,
		{Cumul Exercice A-1 (Quantité en UV BL)} as string,
		{MOIS CA PRR N} as string,
		{MOIS CA PRR N-1} as string,
		{CA PRR au cumul} as string,
		{CA PRR au cumul N-1} as string,
		fileName as string
	),
	partitionFileNames:['notDSCTerevaPlateform_update.csv'],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> notDSCTerevaPlateform
extractYearMonthc sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		{Région Statistique} as string,
		Enseigne as string,
		{Marque DESC} as string,
		{Marque Code} as string,
		{Sous Famille} as string,
		{Référence Article Fournisseur} as string,
		{Article National DESC} as string,
		{Article National Code} as string,
		{Agence Code} as string,
		{Agence DESC} as string,
		{Département DESC} as string,
		{Département ID} as string,
		Secteur as string,
		{Quantité en UV BL} as string,
		{Année Précédente (Quantité en UV BL)} as string,
		{Cumul Exercice (Quantité en UV BL)} as string,
		{Cumul Exercice A-1 (Quantité en UV BL)} as string,
		{MOIS CA PRR N} as string,
		{MOIS CA PRR N-1} as string,
		{CA PRR au cumul} as string,
		{CA PRR au cumul N-1} as string,
		fileName as string
	),
	partitionFileNames:['facturationForVanMarkes_update.csv'],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> facturationForVanMarkes
hubsapidNULL sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		yearmonth as string,
		qte_ecoulement as string,
		ca_ecoulement as string,
		POSSAMidString as string,
		HubSAPid as string,
		reference as string,
		distributeur as string,
		{Code postal} as string,
		marque_name as string,
		is_prix_dsc as string,
		qte_ecc as string,
		{Canal distribution} as string,
		{Secteur d'activit�} as string,
		document_vente as string,
		{Jour calendaire} as string,
		{Agence commerciale corrig�} as string,
		{Donneur d'ordre} as string,
		{R�cept. de march.} as string,
		Right_reference as string,
		Facture as string,
		{Type poste Facture} as string,
		{Qt� factur�e} as string,
		{CA factur�} as string,
		Right_HubSAPid as string,
		{Type_Facturation�} as string,
		qt_fact as string,
		ca_final as string,
		qt_final as string,
		data_origin as string,
		canal_final as string,
		Commande as string,
		no_offre as string,
		{ATC Performance} as string,
		canal as string,
		RowCount as string,
		ATC as string,
		{Canal final} as string,
		code_postal_atc as string,
		NomATC as string,
		Matricule as string,
		date_id as string,
		HubName as string,
		id_canal_final as string,
		{qte plateforme final} as string,
		{ca plateforme final} as string,
		Sum_qt_factur_e as string,
		Sum_ca_factur_ as string,
		Sum_ca_ecoulement as string,
		Sum_qte_ecoulement as string,
		code_depot as string,
		id_canal as string,
		marque_code as string,
		{Document de vente} as string,
		{Type de facture} as string,
		Client as string,
		Marque as string,
		{ATC Corrig�} as string,
		{Motif commande} as string,
		{Org. commerciale} as string,
		marque_id as string,
		Offre as string
	),
	partitionFileNames:['facturationForVenteDirect_update.csv'],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> venteDirect
UnionQteNullFacturation sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		yearmonth as string,
		qte_ecoulement as string,
		ca_ecoulement as string,
		POSSAMidString as string,
		HubSAPid as string,
		reference as string,
		distributeur as string,
		{Code postal} as string,
		marque_name as string,
		is_prix_dsc as string,
		qte_ecc as string,
		{Canal distribution} as string,
		{Secteur d'activit�} as string,
		document_vente as string,
		{Jour calendaire} as string,
		{Agence commerciale corrig�} as string,
		{Donneur d'ordre} as string,
		{R�cept. de march.} as string,
		Right_reference as string,
		Facture as string,
		{Type poste Facture} as string,
		{Qt� factur�e} as string,
		{CA factur�} as string,
		Right_HubSAPid as string,
		{Type_Facturation�} as string,
		qt_fact as string,
		ca_final as string,
		qt_final as string,
		data_origin as string,
		canal_final as string,
		Commande as string,
		no_offre as string,
		{ATC Performance} as string,
		canal as string,
		RowCount as string,
		ATC as string,
		{Canal final} as string,
		code_postal_atc as string,
		NomATC as string,
		Matricule as string,
		date_id as string,
		HubName as string,
		id_canal_final as string,
		{qte plateforme final} as string,
		{ca plateforme final} as string,
		Sum_qt_factur_e as string,
		Sum_ca_factur_ as string,
		Sum_ca_ecoulement as string,
		Sum_qte_ecoulement as string,
		code_depot as string,
		id_canal as string,
		marque_code as string,
		{Document de vente} as string,
		{Type de facture} as string,
		Client as string,
		Marque as string,
		{ATC Corrig�} as string,
		{Motif commande} as string,
		{Org. commerciale} as string,
		marque_id as string,
		Offre as string
	),
	partitionFileNames:['AZ_OFacturactionPartedisLikeWithIndex_update.csv'],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> OFacturactionPartedisLikeWithIndex
Select1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		{NoNiv1;Niv1;NoNiv2;Niv2;NoNiv3;Niv3;NoNiv4;Niv4;NoCli;NomCli;Dept;Ville;NoGrpCli5;GrpCli5;NoGrpCli;GrpCli;PartnerID} as string
	),
	partitionFileNames:['facturationLivrer.csv'],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> outQteLivrer
Select2 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		{NoNiv1;Niv1;NoNiv2;Niv2;NoNiv3;Niv3;NoNiv4;Niv4;NoCli;NomCli;Dept;Ville;NoGrpCli5;GrpCli5;NoGrpCli;GrpCli;PartnerID} as string
	),
	partitionFileNames:['facturationCede.csv'],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> outputQteCede
deleteOtherQuantityAndCA sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		{NoNiv1;Niv1;NoNiv2;Niv2;NoNiv3;Niv3;NoNiv4;Niv4;NoCli;NomCli;Dept;Ville;NoGrpCli5;GrpCli5;NoGrpCli;GrpCli;PartnerID} as string
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> outFactFacturer
